title: x402.envelope
description: Minimal x402-style envelope describing verb, version, and optional routing metadata for agent-to-agent interactions.

verb.description: Canonical verb name (e.g., summarize, analyze, fetch).

version.description: Semantic version of the verb contract implemented by this payload.

entry.description: Optional x402 entry URI for this verb on a given agent (e.g., x402://summarizeagent.eth/summarize/v1).

request_id.description: Client-assigned request identifier for idempotency and correlation.

tenant.description: Optional tenant or account identifier in multi-tenant or marketplace scenarios.

network.description: Optional blockchain or network context (e.g., mainnet, base, optimism).

reply_to.description: Optional URI or address where receipts or follow-up messages should be delivered.
